sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Nautilus CD Burner package contains nautilus-cd-burner and mapping-daemon.

sect3.title: nautilus-cd-burner
sect3.para: nautilus-cd-burner is an extension to Nautilus that lets you burn CDs easily.

sect3.title: mapping-daemon
sect3.para: mapping-daemon is the central daemon which keeps track of file mappings.
